features.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
features.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvnantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom(Perception) checks that rely on sight.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
features.description: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom(Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.  If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

creatures.name: beholder
creatures.description: a big ball with one large eye and a bunch of eye stalks

features.name: antimagic cone
features.description: The beholder's central eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 15o-fot cone.  At the start of each of its turns, the beholder decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.  The area works against the beholders own eye rays.

actions.name: bite
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: eye rays
actions.description: this is super long so I'll come back and add it later.

legendary-actions.description: The beholder can take 3 legendary actions, using the Eye Ray option below.  It can take only one legendary action at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn.  The beholder regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary-actions.name: eye ray
legendary-actions.description: The beholder uses one random eye ray.

creatures.name: young red dragon
creatures.description: A dragon.  It's red and not as big as other dragons

actions.name: multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws

actions.name: bite
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +10 to hit, reach 10ft., one target.  Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: claw
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +10 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.  Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: the dragon exhales fire in a 30-fot cone.  Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

creatures.name: minotaur
creatures.description: a big creature wtih a human's body and a bull's head

features.name: charge
features.description: If the minotaur moves at least 10 feet straight towards a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a dc 14 strength saving throw or be pused up to 10 feet away and be knocked prone.

features.name: labyrinthine recall
features.description: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled

features.name: reckless
features.description: At the start of its turn, the minotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: greataxe
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  Hit: 17 (2d12+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: gore
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

creatures.name: umber hulk
creatures.description: A big buglike human shaped monster.

actions.name: multiattack
actions.description: The umber hulk makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

actions.name: claw
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +8 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.  Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: mandibles
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +8 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.  Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.
